page.title: 04Industries
page.content: The industry in Queensbury is varied alot.Their are all kinds of mills and factories in Queensbury. Some of them have been around for over 100 years such has R J Patchet who have been around since 1840. They specialise in house repairs, building, new building, bungalows,poulrty, battery cage, equipment , section of buildings, they are also sheet metal fabricaters and make lockers. West Scholes Mil manufacture Synthetic fibres then sell them to yarn spinners and manufactures.This mill was originally built to be a brewery in the early 1800's but was enlarged in 1930's then it was turned into a weaving shed which wove furnishing fabrics. West Scholes synthetic fibres has been around for about 8-9 years.
